snippet: David Longstreth of Dirty Projectors talks about the inspirations in the recording of “Swing Lo Magellan,” with an exclusive preview stream of the album.
abstract: Dirty Projectors front man David Longstreth talks about the inspirations in the recording of the band's Swing Lo Magellan album.
lead_paragraph: David Longstreth of Dirty Projectors talks about the inspirations in the recording of “Swing Lo Magellan,” with an exclusive preview stream of the album.

headline.print_headline: Inspiration in the Bible and the Beats
headline.seo: David Longstreth of Dirty Projectors on the New Album
headline.main: Inspiration in the Bible and the Beats
